Game.Name: 2 Games in 1 - Moto GP + GT Advance 3 - Pro Concept Racing (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It+En)
Game.plot: 2 Games in 1: GT Advance 3: Pro Concept Racing + MotoGP is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Various and published by THQ,which was released in Europe in 2004.Cheat: At starting screen press these to unlock:Cheat: To unlock expert mode, beat and achieve a gold medal on every race in every class on normal mode. Including licence trials. Cheat: On the Mode Select Screen, choose the Drift-Combo option and get 10 consecutive drifts in a row. An easy way to do this is to drift multiple times, it doesnt matter if the drifts are nice looking and stay on the track. When your drifts are counted at the end, It will tell you that you unlocked a Soarer, a Lexus SC430.Cheat: When you see the main menu, go to the option menu.Then select ''enter password''.
